ch.hephaistos.utilities.loki.util.interfaces

Interface ChangeListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExampleMain
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface ChangeListener
    This interface is intended to be used in combination with TransferGrid. You can implement this interface and add it trough ReflectorGrid. It will be called every time there is an update, and you will receive the object that was updated as well as the field that was updated. This is made specifically this way so that you can focus on only updating the necessary parts of your Application Example: {@code public class ExampleMain extends Application implements ChangeListener { ReflectorGrid reflectorGrid = new ReflectorGrid(); ... reflectorGrid.addChangeListener(this);
    Author:
    Ricardo Daniel Monteiro Simoes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onObjectValueChanged(java.lang.reflect.Field field, java.lang.Object oldValue, java.lang.Object newValue, java.lang.Object object)
      This function gets called every time the ReflectorGrid sets a new value to a variable.

    • Method Detail

      • onObjectValueChanged

        void onObjectValueChanged(java.lang.reflect.Field field,
                          java.lang.Object oldValue,
                          java.lang.Object newValue,
                          java.lang.Object object)
        This function gets called every time the ReflectorGrid sets a new value to a variable.
        Parameters:
        field - The field of the object that was updated
        oldValue - The previous value the field was set to
        newValue - The newly set value
        object - The object that was updated
